aboutMe.name: Arun Sai Chilumula
aboutMe.bio: Frontend developer with strong hands-on experience in building responsive, performant web applications using React. Passionate about clean code, reusable components, and modern UI practices.
summary: Strong understanding of React fundamentals and hooks
Experience building reusable and scalable components
Focused on performance and clean UI

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built using React to showcase projects and skills.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A simple CRUD-based Todo application with clean UI and state management.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: A web-based hospital management application designed to manage patient details, appointments, and hospital workflows.
features: Structured frontend layout for hospital modules
Form handling for patient and appointment data

projects.title: Safira UI
projects.description: A reusable UI component library built with React, focusing on clean design, consistency, and scalability.
features: Focus on clean and maintainable UI code
